forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 48. West southwest wind 2 to 7 mph.

forecast.name: Sunday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 64, with temperatures falling to around 62 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 2 to 8 mph.

weather_report:
As the evening settles over Downtown San Francisco, a veil of tranquility blankets the city, the cool air subtly infused with the lingering whispers of twilight. While the forecast hints at a low of around 48 degrees, tonight's sky showcases a patchwork of clouds, casting a gentle, muted glow as the last light of day fades into the horizon. A light breeze rustles through the streets, inviting the faintest chill, making it an ideal evening for a cozy gathering indoors or perhaps a contemplative stroll beneath the stars.

Looking ahead to Sunday, the promise of mostly sunny skies emerges, encouraging a soft awakening with temperatures peaking near 64 degrees as the day unfolds. It's the perfect time to embrace the outdoors, whether taking a leisurely walk along the Embarcadero or savoring a quiet moment in one of the local parks. Layers will be your best ally, a light sweater or jacket serving you well for the morning's crispness before the sun’s warmth envelops you later in the day. Keep an eye out for any encroaching fog from the bay, as the marine layer may dance along the waterfront, adding a touch of mystery to the landscape. The day offers an invitation to savor the simple joys of life, perhaps at a sidewalk café, where one can sip coffee while the world awakens around them.
